text: Kootou naa ko naa tama TeAtua; kootou ni toa a Ia no mee ma ni tino tama aana, iaa Ia ni llee tana manava i kootou. Aa teenaa, kootou ki hakassura te manava aroha aa ma te sosorina taukareka ki telaa tama; kootou see ahu ki kootou soko kootou; kootou ki meemee hakaraaoi telaa tama; kootou ki lavatoa te nnoho seemuu, see lotoloto nauhie.3.12 Eph 4.2
